login.title: CLARITY
login.noConnectionError: Clarity does not yet have an active connection to the server.  Please wait a while and then try again.
login.loginFailedError: The following login error has been reported: __loginError__
login.authenticationFailedError: The following authentication error has been reported: __error__
login.authoriseFailedError: The following authorisation error has been reported:
login.couldNotLoadCountries: Could not load the list of countries.  Please wait a short while and then refresh your browser.  If this doesn't help please contact service desk.
login.noSystemAccess: You do not have access to any system functionality.  Please contact the system administrator.
login.getOutstandingOfflineTasksStatusErrorTit: Could not determine outstanding offline task status

logout.successMessage: has successfully logged out of the system.
logout.onlineRequiredForLogout: You need to go back online before you can logout.
logout.noConnection: You cannot logout at present as you do not have an active connection to the server.
logout.sessionLoggedOut: Your current session has been logged out.  It is possible that your credentials have been used to log in on another machine.

shell.searchProcessResponseEmpty: There are no results to display.
shell.reopenBrowser: Please re-open your browser to get updates.
shell.serviceUpdate: The Clarity Service is busy updating. There may be some delay and your browser may be unresponsive for a few seconds. Please wait for this message to go away before continuing.
shell.serviceUpdateShort:
The Clarity Service is busy updating.
 Wait to login.

system.rolesMismatchMessage: Your roles do not match in all the systems.
system.contactServiceDesk: Please contact service desk as this could cause problems when submitting messages.

modules.restartMessage:
You must restart the application for the new modules to take effect.
Click OK to restart the application now.

validations.provideMobiledetails: Please specify both the mobile code and number.
validations.typeDateErrorMessage: Date should be greater than today's date
validations.identificationErrorMessage: The 11th digit must be a 0 or a 1

inbox.title: Inbox
inbox.clearMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all your inbox messages?

localization.restartMessage:
You must restart the application for the newly selected language to take effect.
Click OK to restart the application now.

controller.invalidDataMessage: Please provide valid data for all fields:

datagrid.defaultDeleteText: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

datepicker.invalidFormat: __displayName__ must be in the form dd/mm/yyyy (e.g. 31/12/2000)
datepicker.invalidMinDate: __displayName__ is less than the valid range of dates
datepicker.invalidMaxDate: __displayName__ is greater than the valid range of dates

support.title: Support
support.description: If you are on a MultiChoice domain or you need any other assistance please contact service desk on extension 3555.

nodejs.description: In order to use Clarity on a desktop you need to install the Clarity Service on your computer. It runs Clarity on your local machine.
nodejs.installationDescription: Select the download link below and run the installation once the download completes.
nodejs.startService: Once installed please refresh the Clarity page and then click on the Go to Login Page Button. If you still see the prerequisites page there could be an issue with the service. You will have to check if the service is running, to do so you will have to open Task Scheduler by clicking on Start, click Control Panel, double-click Administrative Tools, and then double-click Task Scheduler. Find the Clarity Service under the list of local tasks, right click and select run from the options, ensure the status changes to running.
nodejs.version: We have detected that the version installed __localServerVersion__ does not match the required version __localServerRequiredVersion__, you will need to download and install the latest version.

searchProcessResponse.title: Search Process Responses
searchProcessResponse.invalidTerm: Please enter a search term that is at least 3 characters long.

offline.workOfflineConfirmationMessage: You are about to go into 'offline' mode.  You will only be able to access offline functionality until you go back online.  Are you sure that you want to continue?
offline.workOnlineConfirmationMessage: You are about to go into 'online' mode.  You will only be able to go back into 'offline' mode when you have an active connection to the server.  Are you sure that you want to continue?

featureToggles.retrieveFailure: Could not retrieve the feature toggles.  Error: __error__
featureToggles.isEnabledError: Could not determine feature toggle '__name__'.  Error: __error__
featureToggles.empty: No feature toggles have been loaded.
featureToggles.unknownValue: Feature toggle value '__value__' not supported.  It must be either 'true' or 'false'.

messaging.deliveryFailure: Your message could not be delivered.  Please try again.
